excerpt: "Funk and his family did not appear to be home that night, but the message coming from the street was loud and clear. “We’re calling on anyone who wants to run against Glenn Funk, come holler at us,” said former public defender and onetime congressional candidate Keeda Haynes during a passionate address to the crowd gathered just beyond Funk’s front yard."
